channel.title: Home-rsses on Vlad Stoica
channel.description: Recent content in Home-rsses on Vlad Stoica

item.description:
Biography

I am a second year student at King’s College London studying Computer Science with Management. In my first year, I have achieved a first grade and I also obtained “Computer Science with Management Prize” for achieving the highest grade from my course.

I have been working as a backend developer at Lostmy.name for over a year where we have a backend built on the e-commerce platform Solidus. The backend handled over 1,800,000 books sold in over 184 countries.
